name: Peppermint Halo
Description: Blended with peppermint, eucalyptus, and rosemary, Peppermint Halo is our #1 best-selling headache reliever. Its cooling, tingling sensation is so effective at soothing symptoms, that one sells every two minutes.

name: Peaceful Warrior
Description: A mineral salt-based spray deodorant that's been formulated free of potential skin irritants like baking soda, dyes and artificial fragrances

name: Pain Release
Description: Nature makes painkillers. We blended them for daily use. Soak in the proven power of plants, formulated with l-menthol from peppermint to provide deep, cooling relief, marjoram to decrease inflammation and a novel ingredient, copaiba, to help block pain signals.

name: Extra Strength
Description: Our largest and strongest remedy promotes a warming and cooling sensation to soothe and alleviate muscular pain, soreness, tension and tightness caused by sore muscles, back aches, strains and sprains.

name: Sleep Well
Description: Yes, nature makes sleep aids. Sleep Well is our most potent plant-based roll-on for balanced, refreshing sleep. Roman chamomile is proven to ease restlessness.

name: Hair Repair
Description: Replenish, condition and repair dry, brittle and or damaged hair with this deeply nourishing and reparative hair oil treatment.
